operators

Class XMLreadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • operators.XMLreadManager

  • public class XMLreadManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class XMLreadManager. Parser for xml file containing information of ImageLayers and its MarkingLayers. SaxParser is used in parsing.

    • Field Summary

      The Constant LOGGER.

      The SAXParserFactory for parsing XML document.

      • foundImageLayer

        public boolean foundImageLayer(java.lang.String xmlFileName,
                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> imageLayerNameList)
        Parses xml-file to find is any ImageLayers found with given list of names of ImageLayers.
        Parameters:
        xmlFileName - the path of XML file.
        imageLayerNameList - the list of names of ImageLayers
        Returns:
        true, if successfully found data of ImageLayer

      • getMarkingsOfXML

        public java.util.ArrayList<ImageLayer> getMarkingsOfXML(java.io.File xmlFile,

        Parses xml-file to find given list of ImageLayers and updated data of them.
        Parameters:
        xmlFile - the xml-file
        imageLayerList - the list of ImageLayers
        Returns:
        the list of ImageLayers with updated data

      • getMarkingsOfXML

        Parses xml-file to find given single found ImageLayer and updated data of it.
        Parameters:
        xmlFile - the xml-file
        imageLayer - the image layer
        Returns:
